hero.description: Streamline your lending operations with our comprehensive platform. Manage your customers, track collection routes, handle multiple loan types, and monitor staff expenses—all in one powerful system.

features.description: From daily collections to gold loans, handle all your lending products with specialized tools designed for each loan type.

customerManagement.title: Customer Management
customerManagement.description: Complete customer profiles with KYC documents, contact history, and loan records. Easily search, filter, and manage your entire customer base.

dailyLoan.title: Daily Loan Management
dailyLoan.description: Handle daily collection loans with precision. Built-in route tracking ensures your staff visits every customer efficiently.

weeklyLoan.title: Weekly Loan Management
weeklyLoan.description: Manage weekly repayment schedules with automated reminders and route optimization for field agents.

emiLoan.title: EMI Based Loans
emiLoan.description: Calculate EMI schedules, track payments, and manage long-term loans with comprehensive amortization tables.

goldLoan.title: Gold Loan Management
goldLoan.description: Specialized module for gold loans with item valuation, secure storage tracking, and release management.

monthlyLoan.title: Monthly Loan Management
monthlyLoan.description: Handle monthly installment loans with flexible terms, interest calculations, and payment scheduling.

staff.description: Give your team the tools they need to manage customers, track expenses, and achieve targets efficiently. Everything they need, right at their fingertips.

createLoans.title: Create & Manage Loans
createLoans.description: Staff can easily create new loans, update existing ones, and manage the complete loan lifecycle.

expenseTracking.title: Expense Tracking
expenseTracking.description: Track daily expenses, travel costs, and reimbursements with receipt uploads and approval workflows.

routeOptimization.title: Route Optimization
routeOptimization.description: Intelligent route planning for daily and weekly collections to maximize efficiency.

performanceDashboard.title: Performance Dashboard
performanceDashboard.description: Real-time metrics on collections, targets, and performance for staff and managers.

attendanceTime.title: Attendance & Time
attendanceTime.description: Track staff attendance, field visits, and time spent with comprehensive reports.

commissionManagement.title: Commission Management
commissionManagement.description: Automated commission calculations based on collections and new customer acquisition.

cta.description: Take control of your loan management with Loan.App. Customized to fit your business needs, from customer onboarding to daily collections.

footer.description: Complete loan management system customized for your lending business.
